meanings.definition: A person or thing that ruins or spoils something.
meanings.sent1: The rain was a ruiner for our picnic.
meanings.sent2: The careless guest turned out to be the ruiner of the surprise party.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel became the ruiner of the bird feeder.
meanings.sent4: The spilled paint can was a silent ruiner of the new carpet.
meanings.sent5: The broken vase lay on the floor, a visible ruiner of the room's beauty.

meanings.definition: A person who causes the downfall or destruction of something.
meanings.sent1: The evil sorcerer was known as the kingdom's ruiner.
meanings.sent2: The reckless driver became the ruiner of many lives in the accident.
meanings.sent3: The clumsy waiter turned out to be the ruiner of the fancy dinner party.
meanings.sent4: The invasive species acted as a ruiner to the delicate ecosystem.
meanings.sent5: The villain in the story was the ultimate ruiner of the hero's plans.
